properties.entry: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SCH_NO , MEM_NO , SCH_TITLE , SCH_STARTDATE , SCH_ENDDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCH.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT SCH_NO , SCH_TITLE , SCH_STARTDATE , SCH_ENDDATE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT FOLLOWING , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME FROM FOLLOW JOIN MEMBER ON (FOLLOWING = MEM_NO) WHERE FOLLOWER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT SCH_NO , SCH_TITLE , SCH_STARTDATE , SCH_ENDDATE FROM SCHEDULE JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ?
